definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: A Swiss was busy making notes.
sentences.chinese: 一个瑞士人忙着记笔记。

sentences.english: Sixty thousand Prussians invaded Denmark in February.
sentences.chinese: 六万普鲁士人于二月入侵了丹麦。

sentences.english: The horrified Philistines gave a shout of terror.
sentences.chinese: 惊恐的腓利士人发出可怕的叫声。

sentences.english: Hodgson has allowed the Swiss defender Philipp Degen to join Stuttgart on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 老霍同意将瑞士人德根租借到斯图加特一年。

sentences.english: Cryptology was born among people, later circulated into the palace, and became popular among scholars.
sentences.chinese: 隐语产生于民间，后渐入宫廷，逐步士人化。

sentences.english: The augmentations also represent the aesthetic interests of the intellectuals in the middle and late Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 增益行为也反映了中晚明士人的审美趣尚。

sentences.english: A philistine from the valley of Sorek.
Wang Chong paid a great attention to scholars' social mission.
sentences.chinese: 王充对士人的使命有着强烈的关注。

sentences.english: It is literature researcher that has first prompted the thesis that scholar-officials in Wei and Jin dynasties valued feelings.
sentences.chinese: 魏晋时期士人的重情是文学研究者首先提出来的。

sentences.english: However, many Swiss committee suicide by using such guns;
sentences.chinese: 不过，很多瑞士人就用当兵时公家发的枪枝自杀。

sentences.english: Gessler ruled over Switzerland. The Swiss people hated him.
sentences.chinese: 盖斯勒统治着瑞士，瑞士人都痛恨他。

sentences.english: He instead became a professional painter who received commissions from his scholar friends.
sentences.chinese: 他转而成为职业画家，从士人友人处取得润笔。

sentences.english: The Prussians, apparently, are content to sit and wait, but for how long?
sentences.chinese: 普鲁士人，表面上不动声色，但这会持续多久？

sentences.english: On hearing it, those Swiss living abroad will feel homesick.
sentences.chinese: 客居异乡的瑞士人听了放牧调会引起强烈的思乡之情。

sentences.english: Saul was King of Israel during the war against the Philistines.
sentences.chinese: 在对抗腓利士人的战争期间，扫罗是以色列人的国王。

sentences.english: ShanghArt Gallery founded by a Swiss studied history of art.
sentences.chinese: 香格纳由一位学艺术史的瑞士人创建。

definition: land-owning class, esp. during Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties 魏晉南北朝|魏晋南北朝
famous scholar/worthy/celebrity, esp. distinguished literary person having no official post
high-ranking officials in the court of a Chinese emperor
Shilin or Shihlin district of Taipei City 臺北市|台北市[Tai2 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
